name: Farm Frenzy: Heave Ho
description: Yarrrrrr! Scarlett is back in an all-new Farm Frenzy adventure that puts the fun back in farming! Guide the red-haired beauty as she sets aside her vacation plans to help the animals of an abandoned island learn to provide for themselves.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB 3D graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
